subject: Re: Thnk about this...
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Nobody cares--it's ego inflation that is important.

F-S

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:
>
>  Doing ghost hunts most are going into old, usually abandoned, not
> maintained--or cleaned buildings. There's mold, dust, dirt, insects, rat and
> mouse droppings that contain viruses and bacteria, lead based paint,
> asbestos, radon, and who knows what other toxins. No one takes any
> precautions, they get this stuff in their hair, clothes, and cars, then
> bring it home to their children, freinds and families, then wonder why the
> kids are getting wierd deseases. Who is going to pay your health bills, the
> property owners, the event promoters? I don't think so! Still think it's all
> fun and games, a quest for fame and fortune?
> 
>  I wouldn't go ghost hunting without a full hasmat suit, including a
> respirator!
> 
>  Just tell yourselves I don't know anything, bring your pregnant wife on
> your hunts, or your newborns--couldn't hurt--right?
> 
> Frank-S
>
